hero.title: Power Solutions Tailored to Your Needs
hero.description: Citypack delivers battery systems across a range of capacities and configurations. From compact systems for small events to high-capacity solutions for major productions, we provide the right specifications for your requirements.

items.title: Compact Systems
items.description: 2-5kW continuous power. Perfect for pop-ups, small installations, and mobile applications. Lightweight, portable, silent operation.

items.title: Mid-Range Systems
items.description: 5-10kW continuous power. Versatile solutions for film shoots, medium events, and temporary installations. Professional connectivity and monitoring.

items.title: High-Capacity Systems
items.description: 10kW+ continuous power. Heavy-duty systems for major events, large productions, and demanding installations. Maximum power when you need it most.

items.title: Right-Sized Power

items.title: Professional Connectivity

items.title: Advanced Battery Technology
items.description: LiFePO4 (LFP) chemistry across all systems for safety and longevity. Professional battery management systems with real-time monitoring.

items.title: Flexible Charging Options
items.description: Fast charging capabilities when time is critical. Standard charging when you have flexibility. Auto-adjusting inputs for optimal performance.

items.title: Built for the Field
items.description: Rugged construction, industrial mobility, and weather-resistant designs. Built to withstand the demands of professional applications.

items.title: Complete Monitoring
items.description: Real-time battery status, power consumption tracking, and safety monitoring. Remote access via Bluetooth and WiFi on select systems.
